root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 4-1-3, translated into all languages

languages.language: Primary; Lower secondary / Fundamental; Secondary 2nd cycle / Post fundamental; [Post-fundamental: At the start of the cycle, General and educational, Technical]; [At the end of the cycle: At the start of the cycle, General and educational, Technical]

Primaire; Secondaire premier cycle/Fondamental; Secondaire 2ème cycle/Post fondamental; [Post-fondamental: A l'entrée du cycle, Général et pédagogique, Technique]; [A la Fin du cycle: A l'entrée du cycle, Général et pédagogique, Technique]
